annotations: I want a grey background. I also need two text boxes. Make the text font calibri and font size 16. The text should be red. Add 2 lines of text, a scrollbar and 7 radiobuttons. I also need a drop down menu.
I want a black background. Give me a text box and a button. Make the text green. Text font should be arial. I would like the font size to be 18. i also want a menu at top
Background should be white. Give me two buttons. Text colour should be blue. Text font should be century. Make the font size 14. Add 17 text labels and an image
I want a white background with blue foreground. Text font should be cambria. Font size should be 14. Give me 8 text boxes and one button. Then add a scrollbar and 4 radiobutton
I want a grey background with blue foreground. Give me 6 text boxes 3 buttons , 4 scalers, 8 spinboxes and a dropdown menu. Font size should be 12. Text Font should be calibri.
Give me light blue background with black foreground. Give me two text boxes and two buttons. Make the text font century. Text size should be 12.

Give me a light orange background with black foreground. Give me two text boxes of length 20 and 8 breadth. Give me a button of length 15 and 6 breadth. Give me one more button of length 4 and breadth 4.Add 5 lines of text, a scrollbar and 7 radiobuttons. I also need a scaler and a menu.
I want a grey background. Give me 4  text boxes, 2 scrollbars and a menu . One yellow button. Text font is Georgia and text size is 12.
